item.title: Unmanned Aerial Vehicles
item.description:
Project Jatayu is the autonomous UAV team of RVCE (undergrad university)

  • Built multiple UAVs, both multicoptors and fixed wings.
  • Developed robust perception modules for noisy and poorly lit video footage from drones for object detection and localization. Some of the work available here
  • As the team lead, participated in the Student Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Challenge (SUAS 2019), held in Maryland, USA. Details about the drone developed for the competition.
